entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %

Dewpoint: -10.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 70 gusting to 100 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
